review_title: A cordial and friendly working environment with skills building and enhancement
job_title: Director of Strategic Information in Abuja, Federal Capital Territory
pros: Friendly environment, capacity building taken seriously. rewarding work with great impact on beneficiaries
cons: Work may be limited by the time span of projects.

job_title: Deputy Manager in Abuja, Federal Capital Territory
pros: covers 50 percent of disease burden in Nigeria. Operate also a social enterprise section marking them to generate revenue to remain in operation
cons: Operates like government and hence takes time to make decisions

pros: Great for starters because you get to learn a lot. Great for nursing mothers, because of a creche within the office
cons: Poor salary which pushed many to leave the company. Heard they later adjusted their salary

review_title: Best place for extensive hands-on experience on the field and administratively
job_title: Program Manager in Abuja, Federal Capital Territory
pros: Awesome and highly skilled program staff with great diversity and experience. SFH Nigeria is arguably the biggest and most proactive NGO in Nigeria.
cons: Executive Management can be sometimes insensitive to the genuine performance-related needs of operations staff. Below the Director cadre, remuneration is poor and incomparable to other similar stake organizations in the industry. There is also tendency to overwork staff unduly.

review_title: Its a great organization to work in. My experience has been largely positive.
job_title: Senior Technical Specialist in Abuja, Federal Capital Territory
pros: Already said above.  Opportunity to  show innovation, supportive work environment and child friendly policies for working mothers.
cons: Like every organizations, SFH needs to strengthen staff exit process

job_title: Senior Monitoring and Evaluation Officer in Lagos
pros: Good platform for starters in development
Nice place to work. Pleasant coworkers
cons: None that I can think of at the moment

pros: Great family and place to work
cons: Slow to adapt technology and innovate
